players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Alice, Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out to keep the town safe."
You: "Charlie, why are you so sure about Bob? We need more than an accusation without evidence."
You: "Charlie, if you're the detective, you should have investigated someone last night. Who did you check and what did you find? Otherwise your claim seems baseless."
Bob: "Charlie, your accusation is suspicious without any proof. If you truly investigated someone, share your results to help the town. Otherwise, you might be trying to mislead us."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and confirmed he is the mafioso. Diana's death shows the mafia is active. Trust me on this; we need to vote Bob out now to protect the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
